_documentation: This component implements frameworks for enabling democratic determination of AI values and objectives through participatory processes, extending technical alignment with mechanisms that allow diverse stakeholders to deliberate on and decide what constitutes appropriate AI behavior in different contexts.
name: Democratic Alignment
description: Frameworks for enabling community determination of AI values and objectives through participatory processes. This approach extends technical alignment with democratic mechanisms that allow diverse stakeholders to deliberate on and decide what constitutes appropriate AI behavior in different contexts, ensuring systems serve collective rather than narrow interests.

overview.purpose: To ensure AI systems serve democratically determined values and objectives through participatory governance, deliberative processes, and inclusive decision-making about AI alignment

literature._documentation: This section provides references to academic literature and research papers that inform and support the concepts, capabilities, and functions described in this component.

literature_connections.relevant_aspects: Fishkin's research on deliberative democracy provides models for structured stakeholder participation in democratic processes
Christian et al.'s work on collective decision-making offers frameworks for democratic governance of AI systems
Allen's research on institutional design provides models for implementing democratic oversight of AI systems
Kortz et al.'s work on public understanding of AI offers insights for building AI literacy to support democratic engagement
Irving et al.'s work on AI safety via debate offers methods for participatory verification of AI alignment
Bai et al.'s work on constitutional AI provides models for participatory verification of AI alignment
Price et al.'s research on AI literacy and education informs approaches to building deliberative capacity
Askell et al.'s work on cooperation in AI governance provides frameworks for implementing democratic alignment
